arguments.argument:
str[0] = "What black apple?" str[1] = "Huh. I guess it left. Maybe I just imagined it..." str[2] = "I wouldn't be surprised. You're a real cuckoolander." str[3] = "Not anymore. An entity called the [Arch Protector] is apparently endangering this planet, so now I've decided to get with the program. So anyways, to the point. Tell me about what happened in the tunnel, please." str[4] = "No." str[5] = "Huh?" str[6] = "I've decided not to tell anyone about it." str[7] = "But we agreed that you would tell me!" str[8] = "People CAN change their minds, you know." str[9] = "Well, I spent half an hour waiting here for you." str[10] = "Sucks for you. I don't want to put up with anyone. I'm leaving and I'll be sure to steer clear of you, so this will be the last time you see me." str[11] = "Fine then! Who needs you, anyways? You just make everything worse and you're a heap of negativity!" str[12] = "Listen to yourself. Why did you have to abandon me for stupid [AKS?]" str[13] = "Fighting [ATS] was pointless. I only did it because I was under your command." str[14] = "Why, you backstabbing..." str[15] = "It feels good to be nice once in a while you know. That way people would actually enjoy being around y-" str[16] = "DON'T FEED ME THAT BULLCRAP!!! I'm too good to listen to such aesops! Now is the time where we depart! Good. Bye!" str[17] = "Good riddance...*"
img[0] = GertrudeFace img[1] = AngelaFace img[2] = GertrudeFace img[3] = AngelaFace img[4] = GertrudeFace img[5] = AngelaFace img[6] = GertrudeFace img[7] = AngelaFace img[8] = GertrudeFace img[9] = AngelaFace img[10] = GertrudeFace img[11] = AngelaFace img[12] = GertrudeFace img[13] = AngelaFace img[14] = GertrudeFace img[15] = AngelaFace img[16] = GertrudeFace img[17] = AngelaFace
name[0] = "Gertrude" name[1] = "Angela" name[2] = "Gertrude" name[3] = "Angela" name[4] = "Gertrude" name[5] = "Angela" name[6] = "Gertrude" name[7] = "Angela" name[8] = "Gertrude" name[9] = "Angela" name[10] = "Gertrude" name[11] = "Angela" name[12] = "Gertrude" name[13] = "Angela" name[14] = "Gertrude" name[15] = "Angela" name[16] = "Gertrude" name[17] = "Angela"
event_inherited();
